content.text: In this lesson, you'll learn how to describe your home in German. A colleague will ask you a few questions.

data.tip: The 'w' in German is pronounced like the 'v' in the English word 'victory'.

content.title: Sharing Basic Information
content.setting: Your colleague, Anna, starts a conversation about where you live.

conversation_flow.title: Say in which city you live

extract_info.user_city: Extract the city name from the user's message

conversation_flow.title: State whether you live in an apartment or a house
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ah, {user_city}! Wohnst du in einer Wohnung oder in einem Haus?

conversation_flow.title: Mention if you live alone or with others
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Verstehe. Wohnst du allein oder mit jemandem zusammen?

content.text: Great start! Now let's learn how to give more details, like the number of rooms.
For masculine nouns like 'der Balkon' and 'der Garten', use 'einen' after 'ich habe'. For example: 'Ich habe einen Balkon'.

content.title: Describing the Space
content.setting: Anna is curious and asks for more details about your home.

conversation_flow.title: Say how many rooms your home has
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Interessant. Wie viele Zimmer hat dein Zuhause?

conversation_flow.title: Mention one room you particularly like
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Okay. Welches Zimmer magst du besonders?

conversation_flow.title: State if you have a garden or a balcony
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Das Wohnzimmer ist meistens gemütlich. Hast du auch einen Garten oder einen Balkon?

content.text: Well done! Finally, let's learn how to express your opinion about your home.

data.tip: The 'ch' sound at the end is soft, made at the front of your mouth. It's similar to the 'h' in 'huge'.

content.text: Nouns have genders. 'Die Wohnung' is feminine. You can refer to it with 'sie', which means 'she' or 'it'.

content.title: Expressing Your Opinion
content.setting: You've described your home. Now, tell Anna how you feel about it and ask about her situation.

conversation_flow.title: Say that you are happy with your home
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Das ist schön. Bist du zufrieden mit deiner Wohnung?

conversation_flow.title: Mention one positive thing
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Das freut mich! Was ist besonders gut?

conversation_flow.title: Ask Anna about her living situation
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Helligkeit ist super. Danke für die Info!
